comments.body: I do not mind if we add them or not. I did not actually use them yet, so a comment in the test will do (or the correct magic to actually manage to create such arrays, I am starting to feel we have been always supporting something that is exceedingly difficult to achieve.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +18,22 @@        "valgrind_error: Tests that are known to error under valgrind.")
    config.addinivalue_line("markers",
        "leaks_references: Tests that are known to leak references.")
    config.addinivalue_line("markers",
        "slow: Tests that are very slow.")
